description: This file defines a React-like component using Qwik framework that renders a hero section with an image, heading, paragraph, and buttons including a confetti animation triggered on click.

methods.name: loadConfetti
methods.description: Dynamically loads the confetti library script if not already loaded and resolves with the confetti object.

methods.name: shoot
methods.description: Triggers multiple confetti bursts using the confetti library with preset defaults.
